data.text: Ɠima loun zunui ɠa ɗa ɠizɛ maaɠoloi zu, kɛɛɠɛ bogai la,
Ɗa zoo è ani ʋagɔiti sɔlɔɔ ga nu laawooiti maaʋele,
Zɔi a dama ga daawooiti, naa ɠa zɛnvui makɛsu,
É la faa ʋaa dɔɔʋɛ nui ma, gaazu ʋa ɠula ani ʋa,
Telebo nui ɠa ɗa zɛɛ ɓɔɛiti wɔinzeɠe,
Zɔi é siɛ ʋelei zɔlegai, telebodai ɠa ɗa naa makɛ,
Tanigaa ta kɛɛzu eɠɛ ta ɓɛtɛ, tama ani nɔpɛ ge la ti ya,
Tanisu naavolo nui ɠa ɗa ani zala, é ʋa zɛnvui unmɔɔ,
Telebo nui ɠa volozu, eɠɛ wozakalagi gola volozu,
Sakpegi kpein ka ɠulazu wasogi zu,
Naavoloi nii sɔlɔɔgai ga wuugi, gaa ɠa ɗa ʋala ba,
Nui ná-kitogi a ɠoloɠolona, toɠa ɗa ziiɓɔlɔ,
Zɔi a wooi ʋɛlɛʋilina, naa ɠa suɓoloɠɔmɔ,
Ɠima nui ná-kalagi ɠa ga zɛnvu ɗɛungi,
Kɛʋele ʋagɔi ɠa ɗa zaalai la nu ma,
Ɠima nu la faa ɠɛa, ni é la ɠigaiziɛni su,
Keelai ɲɔuɗai, naa ɠa ɗa lɔ maanɔɠɔi zu,
Baladai ta unfegi ɠa naama nui luɠɔ, nii é ɠɛlɛzu maaɠoloi ʋa,
Toɠa ga faa ʋagɔ nui wɔinma vai laazeeli,
Nui é ziɛzu ɠima nuiti polu, toɠa ɗa ɠɛ ga ɠima nu,
Maanɔɠɔi ɠa kotoba nuiti polu,
Zunu ʋagɔi ɠa ɗa poganii yɛ ná mavofodaiti bɛ,
Bala nui ná-woza wogai zu ɠa a ɗa ɠɔnɔgi zɔlɔɔ ná, ga bɔɔlɔa,
Zɔi é ɠɛlɛzu ná-doun zunui loɠa vai ʋa, naa la nɛɛni bɛ,
Telebo nui ɠa ɗa daami wo, ziila,
